message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
Let's split it down the middle, no need to get too greedy!
I'm not sure I want to give up that much. Let's keep negotiating!
You're not getting all of it, but I'm willing to compromise. Don't push your luck!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet!
I'm not willing to accept this offer. I think I can do better.
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't make me have to take it all!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to go down without a fight!
You're not giving up, I won't either. Make a better offer or I'll take it all!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up until we're done!
Fine, I'll take it. But don't think you got the better end of the deal!
